skilllist.skilldesc:
When Argus' Demonic Blade reaches 100 <font color="a6aafb">Malice Energy</font>, he will launch a <font color="a6aafb">Demonic Slash</font> with his next Basic Attack, dealing 180<font color="fba51f"> (+80% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> and recovering 150<font color="fba51f"> (+10% Total Physical Attack)</font> HP. This attack ignores 40% of the target's Physical Defense.

Argus' Demonic Blade gains 5 <font color="a6aafb">Malice Energy</font> per second, and each of his Basic Attacks grants 10 <font color="a6aafb">Malice Energy</font> (critical strikes grant an additional 10 energy).

Argus stretches out a demonic hand in the target direction, dealing 125<font color="fba51f"> (+60% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to the first enemy hero or Creep hit, stunning them for 0.7s, and pulling him and the target towards each other. If no enemy is hit, Argus pulls himself toward the hand's destination instead.

<font color="a6aafb">Use Again</font>: Argus dashes and strikes in the target direction, dealing 175<font color="fba51f"> (+100% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies along the path.

After a short delay, Argus thrusts his Meteoric Sword in the target direction, dealing 120<font color="fba51f"> (+100% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies hit (200% damage against minions) and reducing their Movement Speed by 80% for 0.8s. The delay time will decrease as Argus' Attack Speed increases.
Enemy heroes or Creeps hit will be <font color="a6aafb">Cursed</font> for 4s, during which they will leave a Cursed Trail behind. Argus gains 20% Movement Speed while on a Cursed Trail. Argus' Basic Attacks on <font color="a6aafb">Cursed</font> targets will grant extra double <font color="a6aafb">Malice Energy</font>.
<font color="a6aafb">Meteoric Sword</font> damage counts as Basic Attack damage and can trigger Attack Effects.

Argus removes all debuffs on himself (except for Suppression) and enters <font color="a6aafb">Eternal Evil</font> state, gaining <font color="a6aafb">Death Immunity</font> for 4s. While in this state, 40% of his damage dealt to enemy heroes will be converted into HP for him once the state ends.

Leaving the <font color="a6aafb">Eternal Evil</font> state also resets enemy Turrets' damage increase against Argus.]

<font color="a6aafb">Passive:</font> Permanently increases the recharge of <font color="a6aafb">Malice Energy</font> by 150<font color="fba51f"> (+50% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="a6aafb">per second</font>.

data.name: Argus

__data.skilldesc:
For up to 8 Basic Attacks within the next 5s, increase Attack Speed to 1.5 times and the Attack Speed cap to 500%.
The Basic Attacks also <font color="62f8fe">ignore</font> 8 (+1*Hero Level) of the target's <font color="ffe63c">Physical Defense</font> and restore 60<font color="fba51f">(+0.15 Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="62f8fe">(+0.15 Total Magic Power)</font> HP on hit.
__data.skilldesc_text: For up to <Num2> Basic Attacks within the next <Num1>s, increase Attack Speed to <Num3> times and the Attack Speed cap to <%Num4>.####The Basic Attacks also [C2ignore] <Num5> of the target's [C5Physical Defense] and restore <Num6> HP on hit.
__data.skilldescemblem:
For up to 8 Basic Attacks within the next 5s, increase Attack Speed to 1.5 times and the Attack Speed cap to 500%.
The Basic Attacks also <font color="62f8fe">ignore</font> 8 (+1*Hero Level) of the target's <font color="ffe63c">Physical Defense</font> and restore 60<font color="fba51f">(+15% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="62f8fe">(+15% Total Magic Power)</font> HP on hit.

recommendmasterplan.description: Exp Lane: Full-on offense build with high burst damage against back line enemies.

emblemattr.emblemattr:
+14 Adaptive Penetration
+10 Adaptive Attack
+3% Movement Speed

emblemskill.skilldesc: If there is only one enemy hero nearby, damage dealt to them is increased by 7%.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: If there is only one enemy hero nearby, damage dealt to them is increased by <%Num1>.
emblemskill.skilldescemblem: If there is only one enemy hero nearby, damage dealt to them is increased by 7%.

emblemskill.skilldesc:
After every 3 separate Basic Attacks or skills hit an enemy hero, all damage dealt increases by 8% for 6s.

<font color="8098ab">A single Basic Attack or skill that deals damage multiple times only counts as 1</font>.
<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 6s</font>.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: After every <Num1> separate Basic Attacks or skills hit an enemy hero, all damage dealt increases by <%Num2> for <Num3>s.########[8098ab]A single Basic Attack or skill that deals damage multiple times only counts as 1[-].####[8098ab]Cooldown: <Num4>s[-].
emblemskill.skilldescemblem:
After every 3 separate Basic Attacks or skills hit an enemy hero, all damage dealt increases by 8% for 6s.

<font color="8098ab">A single Basic Attack or skill that deals damage multiple times only counts as 1</font>.
<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 6s</font>.

equiplist.equipskill1: Fortitude: CC and Slow Duration reduced by 30%
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Fortitude: CC and Slow Duration reduced by 30%

equiplist.equipskill1: Corrosion: Basic Attacks gain 80 extra Physical Damage and slow the target by 8% (halved for ranged Basic Attacks) for 1.5s. Stacks up to 5 times.
equiplist.equipskill3: Impulse: Basic Attacks grant 6% extra Attack Speed for 3s, capped at 5 stacks.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Corrosion: Basic Attacks gain 80 extra Physical Damage and slow the target by 8% (halved for ranged Basic Attacks) for 1.5s. Stacks up to 5 times.
Impulse: Basic Attacks grant 6% extra Attack Speed for 3s, capped at 5 stacks.
equiplist.equiptips:
+30 Extra Physical Attack
+5% Movement Speed
+30% Extra Attack Speed

equiplist.equipskill1: Engulf: Basic Attacks deal 8% of the target's current HP as extra Physical Damage (capped at 60 against minions).
equiplist.equipskill2: Devour: Basic Attacks grant 2% Lifesteal for 3s (stacks up to 5 times).
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Engulf: Basic Attacks deal 8% of the target's current HP as extra Physical Damage (capped at 60 against minions).
Devour: Basic Attacks grant 2% Lifesteal for 3s (stacks up to 5 times).
equiplist.equiptips:
+35 Extra Physical Attack
+20% Extra Attack Speed
+8% Lifesteal

equiplist.equipskill1: Lifebane: Dealing damage to a target will reduce the Shield and HP Regen effects on them to 50% of normal for 3s.
equiplist.equipskill2: Punish: Increase damage by 8% against enemy heroes with higher extra HP.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Lifebane: Dealing damage to a target will reduce the Shield and HP Regen effects on them to 50% of normal for 3s.
Punish: Increase damage by 8% against enemy heroes with higher extra HP.
equiplist.equiptips:
+80 Extra Physical Attack
+20% Extra Attack Speed

equiplist.equipskill1: Typhoon: Every 5-2s (reduced by 0.2s for each Basic Attack), the next Basic Attack will hit up to 3 enemy units for 150-362 Magic Damage. (This attack can Crit and the damage increases to 200% against Minions.)
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Typhoon: Every 5-2s (reduced by 0.2s for each Basic Attack), the next Basic Attack will hit up to 3 enemy units for 150-362 Magic Damage. (This attack can Crit and the damage increases to 200% against Minions.)
equiplist.equiptips:
+35% Extra Attack Speed
+20% Crit Chance
+20 Movement Speed

equiplist.equipskill1: Armor Buster: Increase Physical Penetration by 30%.
equiplist.equipskill2: Breaker: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.1% extra Physical Penetration for each point of the enemy's Physical Defense, capped at 30%.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Armor Buster: Increase Physical Penetration by 30%.
Breaker: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.1% extra Physical Penetration for each point of the enemy's Physical Defense, capped at 30%.

recommendmasterplan.name: SENSEY
recommendmasterplan.title: Influencer

data.story: The angel who fell from light into darkness.

assist.desc: Argus works well with utility Supports like Angela and Rafaela who can provide extra Movement Speed and CC to allow Argus to stick to his targets and dish out maximum damage.

strong.desc: Argus counters heroes with poor mobility who cannot escape his attacks once he closes in, such as Gord and Aurora.

weak.desc: Argus is countered by Tanks with high Physical Defense, like Gatotkaca and Tigreal, because a lot of his damage comes from Basic Attacks.
